Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product is truly a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled features and benefits. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, we're offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $15000. This investment will undoubtedly pay off in terms of efficiency, productivity, and satisfaction. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution. Let's discuss how we can make this happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
